page.title: 15FARMING: MR A.HUGHES
page.content: {Farming}in this area has moved during 20 years from traditional small farming to a{narrow range farm.}The traditional farm had a field of potatoes,a field of corn or barley and the rest of the land divided between {grazing and haymaking.}The farmer keeps a small herd of 8_10 cows providing the main cash income.The farmer provided mainly by his crops of hay,corn and barley food for his cattle .Today there are no small dairy herds.Farmers were bought out and only the large dairy farm survives sending milk to{Fane Valley creamery. The farmland in this area is used mainly for grazing and providing silage for winter feeding.A few {orchards}are found here as this area is on the edge of the main apple growing centre,{Loughgall.
